We’re installing a custom standing seam metal awning that blends style with long-lasting protection. Excellent customer support and quality workmanship. Competitive pricing and excellent communication. Strongly recommend for roofing or special project. Will be a repeat customer. More

I highly recommend Stand Up Roofing!  Not only did they do an excellent job, but they did everything on time and communicated thoroughly with us through the whole process!  They also helped us negotiate with our insurance company to ensure a fair price. They are a rare gem in contractors!
